articles.author: KELVIN CHAN
articles.title: Apple lashes out at iPhone porn app maker and the EU rules allowing its download - The Associated Press
articles.description: Apple has chided a newly available pornography app available in the European Union. It also warned that the bloc’s digital rules opening the way for third-party app store downloads undermines consumer confidence in the tech giant. AltStore PAL, an alternative…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Apple has chided a newly available pornography app available in the European Union, and warned that the blocs digital rules opening the way for third-party app store downloads undermines … [+2697 chars]
